Reviews.Title: ok phone.
Reviews.Author: Juleus Smart
Reviews.Content: good phone, screen is to sensitive, expected more from camera. Built a little to cheap.Not reading most memory cards, so suggest the cards one time.

Reviews.Title: Great and easy to use
Reviews.Author: peter albert
Reviews.Content: It performs well When compared to an iPhone and the price is reasonable. The phone is great and simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful small smartphone
Reviews.Author: Shalva Abramia
Reviews.Content: Good small smartphone, winodws OS looks beautiful on it. But it has a little connectivity problems with my headset, can't connect to cellular data and also can't connect on some specific wi-fi access points.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my wife she never received!
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Murrell
Reviews.Content: I cannot rate this phone as I never received it. I never had problems with shipping before but always heard stories of things going missing especially through the post office. Tracking said it was delivered but we never saw anyone come with a delivery. It's the holiday season and I hope this windows phone made someone happy. My wife got no gift but we spent a wonderful holiday together. I am very thankful for the service the seller gave me when I informed them of the situation. They were very helpful. I now await to hear if I will be compensated by the post office for this loss.

ProductInfo.Features:
2G Network: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900, 3G Network: HSPA 850 / 1900 / 2100, Takes a Micro Sim Card
3.8" touchscreen ClearBlack 480 x 800 WVGA display makes your apps, photos, and videos look sharp and vibrant
Take beautiful photos and gorgeous videos with the 5MP rear-facing camera, 720P Video. Front facing camera for video calling.
Store plenty of apps, photos, videos, and files on the 8GB of internal storage (about 4.9GB free). MicroSD Slot for expandable memory up to 64GB (card not included).
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia Lumia 620 8GB Black Unlocked
